languages.text: "С тех пор, как Вистенца исчезла и эти... создания... стали появляться в поселках, прошло уже немало времени. Удивительно, что мы еще не слышали о преступлениях против Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "С тех пор, как Вистенца исчезла и эти... создания... стали появляться в поселках, прошло уже немало времени. Удивительно, что мы еще не слышали о преступлениях против Человечества".

languages.text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."
languages.original_text: "С тех пор, как Вистенца исчезла и эти... создания... стали появляться в поселках, прошло уже немало времени. Удивительно, что мы еще не слышали о преступлениях против Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."
"It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."
"It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."
"It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

languages.text: “自从维丝坦萨消失，这些……生物……开始出现在我们的定居点以来，已经过了好一段时间了。我们目前并没有收到任何针对人类的犯罪报告，这让我很惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: “自从维丝坦萨消失，这些……生物……开始出现在我们的定居点以来，已经过了好一段时间了。我们目前并没有收到任何针对人类的犯罪报告，这让我很惊讶。”

languages.text: «Ha pasado bastante tiempo desde que desapareció Vistenza y empezamos a ver a estas... cosas... en nuestros asentamientos. Me sorprende que todavía no hayamos oído hablar de crímenes contra la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: «Ha pasado bastante tiempo desde que desapareció Vistenza y empezamos a ver a estas... cosas... en nuestros asentamientos. Me sorprende que todavía no hayamos oído hablar de crímenes contra la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「ヴィステンツァが消えて、こんな…生物が…開拓地に現れ始めてから、ずいぶん時間が経った。人類への罪について、何の報告もないのは驚きだな」
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィステンツァが消えて、こんな…生物が…開拓地に現れ始めてから、ずいぶん時間が経った。人類への罪について、何の報告もないのは驚きだな」

languages.text: "Vistenza ist schon eine Weile verschwunden, und dann erschienen diese ... Kreaturen ... in unseren Ansiedlungen. Es überrascht mich, dass wir noch keine Berichte über Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit gehört haben."
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: "Vistenza ist schon eine Weile verschwunden, und dann erschienen diese ... Kreaturen ... in unseren Ansiedlungen. Es überrascht mich, dass wir noch keine Berichte über Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit gehört haben."

languages.text: « Voilà bien longtemps que Vistenza s'est volatilisée et que ces... créatures... ont commencé à apparaître dans nos villages. C'est un miracle qu'aucun crime contre l'humanité n'ait encore été commis. »
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien longtemps que Vistenza s'est volatilisée et que ces... créatures... ont commencé à apparaître dans nos villages. C'est un miracle qu'aucun crime contre l'humanité n'ait encore été commis. »

languages.text: "Vistenza'nın ortadan kayboluşunun ve bu... Yaratıkların yerleşim yerlerimizde ortaya çıkışının üzerinden bir hayli zaman geçti. Hâlâ İnsanlığa karşı suç işlendiğine dair ihbar almamamıza şaşıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It's been quite a while since Vistenza vanished and these... creatures... started appearing in our settlements. I'm surprised we haven't heard any reports of crimes against Humanity yet."

traits.locale_text: "Vistenza'nın ortadan kayboluşunun ve bu... Yaratıkların yerleşim yerlerimizde ortaya çıkışının üzerinden bir hayli zaman geçti. Hâlâ İnsanlığa karşı suç işlendiğine dair ihbar almamamıza şaşıyorum."
